name: dont PLAY THIS GAME (itch)
description:
dont PLAY THIS GAME .

DPTG is a new take on an old concept of games. It takes the concept of a usual vertical scroller shooter, and takes it to a new level - the level of time. Will the power of slowing time down temporarily provide an easier experience, or will the title prove itself?

Game made by dont TRUST THIS TEAM.

Starting off slowly, one’s visited with the usual – two bars, a plane, space and a LOT of comic sans. Having controls as anywhere else, pressing space for shooting, and WASD for moving – it all appears just like any other game you should have played, but yet you play this one. So why are you playing the game you shouldn’t play? Thaaaat’s right – TIME SLOWDOWN! Or literally just boredom.

Holding down E will slow down the level for a limited time, and by slowing down, it is everything that slows down, even the music and your thinking!

Features:

  • e…l…o…n…g…a…t…e…d…...p…l…a…y…t…i…m…e…
  • s…l…o…w…d…o…w…n…
  • sounds varying with accomplishment
  • and the usual, it’s a vertical scrolling shooter after all!
